label: Somatic cell nuclear transfer (frog)
description: Somatic (i.e. not egg or sperm) cells can retain potential for totipotency. (Briggs & King)

label: Differentiated cell nuclear transfer (frog)
description: Differentiated cells (more specialized somatic cells) can retain potential for totipotency (Gurdon).

label: First transgenic mouse
description: Novel genomic elements inserted into the mouse genome (Palmiter).

label: Single tf can reprogram cells
description: A single transcription factor (MyoD) can convert one mature cell type into another (Weintraub, @ Fred Hutch).

label: First knockout mouse
description: Early technology in 1987, demonstration of mouse without a targeted gene in 1989. (Capecchi, Evans, Smithies).

label: Human genome project launched
description: Model organisms chosen alongside human - E. coli, yeast, fruit fly, nematode, mouse

label: Dolly the sheep
description: Viable offspring derived from fetal and adult mammalian cells (Wilmut et al.)

label: Illumina founded
description: Makes sequencers, reagents, and consumables.

label: First draft of mouse genome
description: Mouse Genome Sequencing Consortium publishes C57BL/6J genome.

label: Human Genome Project completed
description: International effort finishes the reference human genome.

label: ENCODE project launched
description: NIH begins cataloging functional elements in the human genome.

label: Allen Institute founded
description: Funded by Paul G. Allen to advance neuroscience.

label: Optogenetics demonstration
description: Deisseroth lab shows optical control of neurons using channelrhodopsin-2.

label: Yamanaka factors
description: Discovered four transcription factors that can reprogram somatic cells into iPSCs.

label: CRISPR for genome editing
description: Doudna and Charpentier show _in vitro_ DNA editing.

label: ImageNet benchmark
description: Eventually this dataset becomes part of ILSVRC, and drives benchmarking of computer vision algorithms.

label: Single-cell mRNA-seq
description: Tang et al. sequence transcriptomes from single mammalian cells.

label: 10x Genomics inc.
description: Company commercializes single-cell and spatial omics platforms.

label: AlexNet â†’ Deep Learning
description: Step jump in image classification, sparks deep learning revolution in computer vision.

label: CLARITY (Brain clearing)
description: Enables intact tissue 3D optical imaging.

label: Horvath clock
description: Epigenetic profiles are predictive of age. Horvath clocks identified ~350 methylation sites that collectively predict chronological age for tissues/celltypes. ([Horvath](https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/gb-2013-14-10-r115)).

label: Autoencoding variational Bayes
description: VAE first introduced.

label: Expansion microscopy
description: Boyden lab expands fixed tissue for nanoscale imaging.

label: Single-cell ATAC-seq
description: Buenrostro et al. map chromatin accessibility at single-cell resolution.

label: Chan Zuckerberg Initiative est.
description: Funded by Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan to support science and education.

label: Perturb-seq
description: CRISPR-based perturbation followed by scRNA-seq. Mainly in immune cells ([Dixit et al.](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0092867416316105?via%3Dihub))

label: Transformers
description: All you need is attention [Vaswani et al.](https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762) - model for language translation.

label: Cellarity Inc.
description: Drug effects for therapeutics in blood and immune cells using ML and single cell multi-omics. Hosts [OpenProblems](https://openproblems.bio/datasets) (ML competitions and datasets).

label: scVI
description: Transcriptomics analysis with variational autoencoders.

label: Coupled autoencoders
description: Multimodal alignment of single-cell resolution profiles (transcriptomics and electrophysiology) for consistent, cross-modal cell type definition.

label: Arc Institute est.
description: Research institute with broad focus. Early computational works include Evo models, STATE model.

label: OpenProblems benchmarks
description: Benchmarking efforts for single-cell multimodal datasets, in PBMC [OpenProblems](https://openproblems.bio/datasets) (ML competitions and datasets).

label: NewLimit Inc.
description: Platform to discover partial (preserve type, reverse age) and durable ways to reprogram liver cells + T cells.

label: Altos Labs Inc.
description: Broadly working in cellular reprogramming; engages in data generation and modeling.

label: Ultima Genomics Inc.
description: Company makes sequencers, consumables, software. Major data producer for CZI's 1 billion cells project.

label: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI makes a ChatGPT publicly available.

label: Somite AI Inc.
description: Platform to refine protocols to control cell fate and differentiation. Data generation + perturbation modeling.

label: Geneformer
description: Transformers applied to single cell data.

label: Tahoe100M open sourced
description: 100M cells, 50 cancer cell lines, 1000 drug perturbations (Tahoe therapeutics + Arc Institute).

label: First personalized CRISPR therapy
description: Base editing to rescue CPS-1 deficiency, _in vivo_ liver cells. [Musunuru et al.](https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa2504747)

label: Project bloom funded
description: Goal is to learn a unified representation space for multi-modal, multi-species data across conditions.
